title: Her Last Audition
description: I was never meant for this world.When you grow up like me, the darkness of the world will surprise you. I didn’t expect the depravity of humanity, or of men.I never saw it coming.After ending up at the wrong place for an audition, the Iron Elite took hold of me quickly. I now know real monsters wear suits, not teeth and claws.There’s one man who looks at me differently than the rest. He looks dangerous, but there’s something hidden in his eyes that calls to me.Are they all monsters? Or will I find my knight in the unlikeliest of places?Her Last Audition is book two in the Iron Elite series but can be read as a standalone. This is a MF romance with dark themes and topics.
author: Ella Burns
